page.title: 05MOTOR INDUSTRY/BRICKENDON
page.content: The Institute of the Motor Industry has its H.Q.at Fanshaws,Brickendon. Established 1920 it is the professional qualifying body for all aspects of the Motor Industry with centres throughout the U.K.& overseas. There are 3 career divisions; commercial, technical & engineering, covering 27 different disciplines inc. manufacturing,retail,repair,insurance assessment,fleet management & allied activities. There are 4 levels of membership & individuals qualify by taking exams.or by demonstrating a sufficient level of experience & pro_ fessional competence. The Institute exams.are held at Technical Colleges & Regional Centres worldwide. Candidates may be exempted if they have success_ fully completed acceptable equivalent courses. A monthly journal "Motor Industry Management"is sent to members
